author: Thomas Drake
title: DubT contract-driven livestream NFT
description: How can we rapidly deploy NFT to support performing artists that fall outside of the mold of NFT graphic artist?
solution: DubToken allows streaming creators to both fund unique performances and mint stream-derived NFTs through a contract-directed media service.
experience: Lead has 21yrs of building functional, distributed software at Amazon, Apple. Partners are leaders in music and content design.
